chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: spec A
e2: DTbin this W s
e1: DTbin this W s

Goal:
e1 = e2 <-> e1 = e2

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
DTbin : nid -> world -> forall A : Type, spec A -> Type
spec = fun A : Type => (pre * post A)%type : Type -> Type Arguments spec _%type_scope
nid = nat : Set
DTbin.prog_of : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), DTbin this W s -> prog W A this
DTbin_make : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (prog_of : prog W A this), prog_of \In has_spec this W s -> DTbin this W s
Record DTbin (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) : Type := DTbin_make { prog_of : prog W A this; _ : prog_of \In has_spec this W s } Arguments DTbin.DTbin _ _ [A]%type_scope Arguments DTbin.DTbin_make [this W] [A]%type_scope [s prog_of]
has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), spec A -> Simpl_Pred (prog W A this)
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (pf : W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q <-> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In...
aft_alwsf : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A), alwsafe s p < -> after s p (fun=> xPredT)
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A
progE : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (T1 T2 : prog W A this), T1 = T2 < -> T1 = T2
stepUnfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 Unfinished sc s2 t < -> False
send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
Actions.send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
stepRet : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A) (v : A), pstep s1 (Ret v) sc s2 t < -> False
alwI : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always s p (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W B) (k : B -> proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc this W B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
stepAct : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Act a) sc s2 t < -> (exists (v : A) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), [/\ sc = ActStep, t = Ret v & a_step pf s2 v])
alwA : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : B -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always s p (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
alwI' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
alwA' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : B -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop), alwsafe_sc s p scs -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc this W A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
iffLR : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
iffRL : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> Q -> P
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
stepInject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc this V A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Inject em t) sc s2 q < -> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this V A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1' t sc' s2' t'])
action = Actions.action : world -> Type -> nid -> Type Arguments action _ _%type_scope
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv = InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
aftI : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : Prop) (Q : A -> state -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => P -> Q v s') < -> (P -> after s p (fun v : A => [eta Q v]))
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
aftA : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : B -> A -> state -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => forall x : B, P x v s') < -> (forall x : B, after s p (fun v : A => [eta P x v]))
InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
